name: Jazzy Jam
description:
A short (incomplete) entry for the Godot Fire Jam.

Unfortunately due to export issues it missed the cutoff.

We struggled a lot to hit the deadline and unfortunately only got through act 1 of our 5 act story.
Dialogue trees and cutscenes were entirely new for us so we may have gotten a bit ambitious, especially since it was our first topdown project as well.

We'll continue working on this and hopefully you can stick around to find out what happens with Maestro and his magic Sax.
